title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element does not display the text content correctly. It does not render HTML tags within <html>...</html> properly. HTML fragments not within <html> tags are also not rendered correctly. Text with RTF tags is not displayed as expected.
EB: The dynamic text element should display the text content correctly, rendering HTML tags within <html>...</html> as intended. HTML fragments not within <html> tags should also be rendered correctly. Text with RTF tags should be displayed as expected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a database field with three types of content:
   - HTML text within <html>...</html> tags.
   - HTML fragments not within <html> tags.
   - Text with RTF tags.
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
